members.member:
Creates new account
Sample request:
POST /api/auth/login { "email": "sample@sample.com", "password": "samplepassword", "displayName": "sampleName", "firstName": "someFirstName", "lastName": "someLastName", "city": "someCity", "country": "someCountry" }
Status If registration was successful When incoming data was invalid. Returns model state information When occured error during registration POST: api/auth/register

Login user
Sample request:
POST /api/auth/login { "email": "sample@sample.com", "password": "samplepassword" }
Access token and detailed information about user Returns access token and detailed information about user When incoming data was invalid. Returns model state information When email or password was invalid POST: api/auth/login

Change user password
Sample request:
PUT /api/users/{id}/changePassword { "oldPassword": "password", "newPassword": "newbetterpassword", }
Status of operation When changing password was successful When access token or old password was invalid PUT /api/users/{id}/changePassword
